entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind light except north 30 km/h near Bowen Island overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind light except north 30 km/h near Bowen Island early in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
